pages.title: Fertilizing the Fungi
pages.text: Magic isn't always a bed of roses. If you're having trouble adventuring for Magic Mushrooms, you can use some $(l)Fungi Fertilizer$(), capable of stimulating Magic Mushrooms' growth in the dark.$(br2)You might craft one by doing the following crafting:
As you may have noticed, we'll need some $(3)$(l)Balls of Mold$(). To obtain them, we'll need any kind of $(6)$(l)food$(), $(9)$(l)Water$() and a $(8)$(l)Molding Cauldron$():

First, insert the food of your choice into the cauldron.$(br)Then, place water inside the Cauldron and wait.$(br)This progress $(n)will$() take a while, so it might be better to do something else while you wait.

Once the water is gone, your mold is ready. The amount of mold created depends of the chosen food's quality.$(br2)$(l)$(n)What determines food's$(br)quality?$()$(br2)$(li)Its nourishment value;$(br)$(li)Whether it's made of meat;$(br)$(li)Grants beneficial effects;$(br)$(li)Whether it's a snack.$(br)
